message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am willing to pay up to $1000000 for the product. I hope this aligns with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your financial constraints, but $1000000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1100000, reflecting both the value of the product and your budget. I hope this is a compromise we can both agree on.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I am willing to pay $950000 for it. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
